content: The Touchstone Team is currently reviewing priority for HL7 FHIR Connectathon 16 in San Diego; we are planning to introduce formal testing to the Terminology Track (similar to the Patient Track), we will be working to update any existing test scripts from Connectahton 14/15 which had any Track Lead feedback. We are looking to explore advanced testing with Patch, Provider Directory and a new Referral effort.

The HL7 FHIR Connectathon 16 test definition group 'FHIR3-0-1-Connectathon16' has been deployed in Touchstone. The following test tracks are available: FHIR Genomics, GraphQL, LastN-Query, PATCH, Patient, Provider Directories, Scheduling and Terminology. We welcome all feedback, comments, and suggestions - on this chat or at Touchstone_Support@aegis.net. -Thank you

@Richard Ettema as you'll see from your logs, I've performed all the Terminology Tests in the Connectathon 16 group - managed to pass them all, plus the Capability Statement. Please advise the best format to provide you with suggestions for adding terminology-related Test Scripts. Maybe the Request URLs and expected responses in XML and/or JSON and you can craft the scripts around them. Definitely need more tests for the $lookup and $subsumes operations on Code System and also for $translate on Concept Map; for the later, we may need to use some more test ConceptMap resources from the spec or other sources. Any other suggestions here, @Rob Hausam?
can we make the master location in the build at /tests/resources?

FYI - Touchstone now has support for GraphQL testing with some initial TestScripts deployed for Connectathon 16.
